SQLLoaderMapping.name: Species types
SQLLoaderMapping.fetch_sql:
SELECT
                s.name AS SpeciesTypeName,
                f.name AS ForestTypeName,
                g.name AS GenusName
            FROM species s
            INNER JOIN forest_type f
                ON s.forest_type_id = f.id
            INNER JOIN genus g
                ON s.genus_id = g.id
SQLLoaderMapping.load_sql:
INSERT INTO species (
                forest_type_id,
                genus_id,
                name)
            SELECT
                f.id,
                g.id,
                @SpeciesTypeName AS name
            FROM forest_type f, genus g
            WHERE f.name = @ForestTypeName
                AND g.name = @GenusName
